description.raw:
* Menu tab which displays all models and lights in the scene

* Inserted/deleted models are instantly updated

* Selecting an object on the scene highlights it on the tree and vice-versa

* Right-clicking an object on the tree opens its context menu to make it transparent/wireframe or delete it

* There's an option on the hamburger menu to open the scene tree when a model is selected or not

* New logic to select entities (`Scene.selectEntity()`) which unifies bounding box display, tree highlighting and manipulator attachment.
description.html:
• Menu tab which displays all models and lights in the scene

  • Inserted/deleted models are instantly updated

  • Selecting an object on the scene highlights it on the tree and vice-versa

  • Right-clicking an object on the tree opens its context menu to make it transparent/wireframe or delete it

  • There's an option on the hamburger menu to open the scene tree when a model is selected or not

  • New logic to select entities (Scene.selectEntity()) which unifies bounding box display, tree highlighting and manipulator attachment.
